summary: This is an email from a Supervisory Staff Attorney at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center, dated August 10, 2019, forwarding a draft notification document titled 'Judge.Berman.Epstein.death.docx' for review. The email was sent shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.

persons.name: Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC
persons.role: Supervisory Staff Attorney at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center
persons.context: The sender of the email, forwarding a draft notification document regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death for review.

events.title: Draft Notification Regarding Epstein's Death
events.description: A Supervisory Staff Attorney at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center sends an email with a draft notification document titled 'Judge.Berman.Epstein.death.docx' for review.

locations: New York Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 10, 2019, sent shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The email contains a draft notification document titled 'Judge.Berman.Epstein.death.docx', indicating official communication regarding Epstein's death.
The sender is a Supervisory Staff Attorney at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center, where Epstein was held.
